Title: Establishes a service corps education grant to be used for tuition costs or loan repayment; and provides for funding for the service corps education grant
Summary: Establishes a service corps education grant to be used for tuition costs or loan repayment; provides for funding for the service corps education grant.
LawCode: Add ยง683-c, Ed L; add ยง184, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a service corps education grant to be used for tuition costs or loan repayment; and to amend the executive law, in relation to funding for the service corps education grant
